Text: Spending Reports OEC Central Purchasing Cc Shirley Jo As per our earlier conversations Jim Kirkpatrick buyer and I formulated the attached two spreadsheets regarding OEC Central Purchasings spending habits over the past two years I have only listed vendorscontractors where we have received in access of k per month and who I feel should be approached about a purchasing agreement that would benefit all Enron Divisions If you have any questions feel free to call Sincerely Jim Meyer ps I know Roy Hartstein and Michael Frost in your group are interest in this also
